scenes.description: Group performance of the song "GIRLS' LEGEND U" by Omaru Polka and guests.
Intermission with audience applause and title card graphics.
Omaru Polka's solo performance of her original song "STARTING OVER".

subtitles.original: 夏も秋も冬も　越え願え　焦がれ走れ
subtitles.english: Through summer, autumn, and winter, overcome, pray, yearn, and run

subtitles.original: あぁ勝利へ
subtitles.english: Ah, towards victory!

subtitles.original: 未来描き　望む目指し
subtitles.english: Drawing the future, aiming for what we desire

subtitles.original: 狙い挑め　掴め　Winning
subtitles.english: Target, challenge, and seize winning!

subtitles.original: ずっと　ずっと　ずっと　想い
subtitles.english: Always, always, always feeling

subtitles.original: 夢はきっと叶うから
subtitles.english: Because dreams will surely come true

subtitles.original: あの日君が流した
subtitles.english: Believe in the tears

subtitles.original: 涙も信じて
subtitles.english: You shed that day

subtitles.original: 雨も風も雲も闇も　越え願え　焦がれ走れ
subtitles.english: Through rain, wind, clouds, and darkness, overcome, pray, yearn, and run

subtitles.original: あぁ勝利へ
subtitles.english: Ah, towards victory!

subtitles.original: Don't stop! Non-stop to finish!
subtitles.english: Don't stop! Non-stop to finish!

subtitles.original: STARTING OVER
subtitles.english: STARTING OVER

subtitles.original: It's finally the true end.
subtitles.english: It's finally the true end.

subtitles.original: I'm ready for... my destiny.
subtitles.english: I'm ready for... my destiny.

subtitles.original: It's finally the true end.
subtitles.english: It's finally the true end.

subtitles.original: I'm ready for... STARTING OVER.
subtitles.english: I'm ready for... STARTING OVER.

subtitles.original: やっと幕を下ろせた　最後の瞬間まで
subtitles.english: I finally lowered the curtain, until the very last moment

subtitles.original: わたしは精一杯に　わたしをやりきった
subtitles.english: I did my absolute best, I lived out my self to the fullest

subtitles.original: 終演の続きは　誰も知らなくていい
subtitles.english: No one needs to know what follows after the final performance

subtitles.original: 涙を置いて　新しい旅に出よう
subtitles.english: Leaving tears behind, let's set out on a new journey

subtitles.original: 熱狂はあなたを選ぶ　違う結末だっただけ
subtitles.english: The fervor chooses you, it was just a different ending

subtitles.original: 同じ愛になれなかった Destiny
subtitles.english: A destiny where we couldn't become the same love

subtitles.original: これまでの全てを　差し出すような愛だった
subtitles.english: It was a love that seemed to offer everything until now

subtitles.original: 世界の意味が変わるくらいに　肯定された気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt affirmed to the point where the meaning of the world changed

subtitles.original: 何気なさの中で　気づけた最初の奇跡が
subtitles.english: The first miracle I noticed in the midst of casualness

subtitles.original: あなたでよかった　わたしでよかった　心から思えたよ
subtitles.english: I'm glad it was you, I'm glad it was me, I truly felt that from my heart

subtitles.original: ずっと遠い未来も　ちゃんと覚えていよう
subtitles.english: Let's remember even the far-off future properly

subtitles.original: 自分の抱きしめかた　明日の願いかた
subtitles.english: How to embrace oneself, how to wish for tomorrow

subtitles.original: あなたがいなくても　わたしの片隅で
subtitles.english: Even without you, in a corner of my heart

subtitles.original: 優しい光　消えたりしないとわかる
subtitles.english: I know that the gentle light will never fade

subtitles.original: 今はまだ手を振れるほど　道は別れたばかりで
subtitles.english: For now, we've only just parted ways, enough to still wave hands

subtitles.original: 後ろ髪に風を感じながら
subtitles.english: While feeling the wind against the back of my head

subtitles.original: それまでの全てが　あなたに出会うためだった
subtitles.english: Everything until then was all for the sake of meeting you

subtitles.original: どの瞬間もムダじゃないこと　本当の意味で知れたから
subtitles.english: Because I've learned in the truest sense that no moment was in vain

subtitles.original: 次の曲がり角も　自分らしさで選べるはず
subtitles.english: I should be able to choose the next turn in the road as myself

subtitles.original: いつかに繋がる　新しい一歩　信じて歩き出そう
subtitles.english: Believe in the new step that leads to some day, and start walking

subtitles.original: 心から誰かを愛せた　あの日々は
subtitles.english: Those days when I could love someone from the bottom of my heart

subtitles.original: 間違いなくわたしの Destiny Ah
subtitles.english: Are undoubtedly my destiny, ah

subtitles.original: これまでの全てが　新しい力をくれる
subtitles.english: Everything until now gives me new strength

subtitles.original: どの瞬間もムダじゃないなら　何が起きても大丈夫だから
subtitles.english: If no moment is in vain, then everything will be alright, no matter what happens

subtitles.original: 次の物語も　自分らしさで選べるはず
subtitles.english: I should be able to choose the next story as myself

subtitles.original: いつかに繋がる　わたしのはじまり　信じて歩き出そう
subtitles.english: Believe in my beginning that leads to some day, and start walking
